name: What Goes Up, Must Come Down (VR Quest)
name_original: What Goes Up, Must Come Down (VR Quest)
description:
Warning, may cause those with weak VR legs to suffer motion sickness!

---

Stuck in a lava cave with only your trusty jetpack, you need to find a number of gems to reveal the exit.

Luckily there are a number of fuel depots to refill your jetpack scattered throughout.

---

This is my first VR project, built using Unreal Engine 5.0

Tested on the Oculus Quest 2, but should work fine on Quest 1.

Also Windows build should work fine on other HMDs
